price: Sεdeε Ɔbεhunu sε ampa, wabͻ wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn asεm no ho dawuro. (Ne nimdeε) atwa deε εwͻ wͻn hͻ no (nyinaa) ho ahyia, na Wakan biribiara nso dodoͻ, (anaasε Onim biribiara dodoͻ).
arabic: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyaʿlama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shayin ʿadadan
